SEARCH
Package flash.embeddedserver.jetty.websocket

Interface WebSocketHandlerWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
WebSocketHandlerClassWrapper, WebSocketHandlerInstanceWrapper
public interface WebSocketHandlerWrapper
A wrapper for WebSocket handler classes/instances that are compatible with Jakarta WebSocket API (Jakarta 5).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default jakarta.websocket.server.ServerEndpointConfig.Configurator
    getConfigurator()
    Gets the ServerEndpointConfigurator for this WebSocket handler.
    Object
    getHandler()
    Gets the actual handler - if necessary, instantiating an object.
    static void
    validateHandlerClass(Class<?> handlerClass)
    Validates that the handler class is either a WebSocketListener or annotated with @WebSocket.

  • Method Details

    • getHandler

      Object getHandler()
      Gets the actual handler - if necessary, instantiating an object.
      Returns:
      The handler instance.

    • getConfigurator

      default jakarta.websocket.server.ServerEndpointConfig.Configurator getConfigurator()
      Gets the ServerEndpointConfigurator for this WebSocket handler.
      Returns:
      the configurator or null if no custom configurator is needed.

    • validateHandlerClass

      static void validateHandlerClass(Class<?> handlerClass)
      Validates that the handler class is either a WebSocketListener or annotated with @WebSocket.
      Parameters:
      handlerClass - the handler class to validate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the handler is invalid
